ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This is my sister's recipe which she cooked at a daycare she worked at years ago...it serves many, and kids love it! It is absolutely delicious."
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Return pasta to pot with chicken, soup, garlic salt and pepper over medium heat.  Heat through, 5 minutes.
